column4: Has anyone seen this scenario: Wireless on my laptop generally works fine in, e.g., FireFox but for some odd reason it doesn't work with the package manager for installing updates -- all the connections just time out.  Ethernet, on the other hand, works fine all around.
can you download from a secure site, like this https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/downloads/file/18281/yoono-4.0.3.5488-fx.xpi
have you tried changing the repositories in the package manager?
